name.description: The name of the library. Used in default definitions. Must be a valid Lua identifier.

version.description: The library version. This will be included as `LIB_NAME.VERSION = LIB_VERSION`, unless `definition` is specified.

luaDirectory.description: The directory in which Lua files will be discovered. Defaults to the path of the library JSON file.

outFile.description: The path to the output Lua file relative to the library JSON file. An output path provided as a command-line argument takes precedence over this.

defaultModules.description: Default modules to include in the bundle when none are specified.

header.description: Content to include at the top of the bundle file.

definition.description: The Lua definition of the library. Defaults to `local LIB_NAME = {}`.

before.description: Content to insert on the line directly before the library definition.

after.description: Content to insert on the line directly after the library definition.

return.description: The Lua return line of the library. Defaults to `return LIB_NAME`.

modules.description: A mapping of module names to module definitions.

require.description: The Lua path to require as the definition of this module. Requires will have the form `LIB_NAME.MOD_NAME = require 'MOD_REQUIRE'`. If `body` is specified, this is ignored.

body.description: The main content of the module definitions. Mutually exclusive with and takes precedence over `require`.

before.description: Content to insert on the line directly before the module body.

after.description: Content to insert on the line directly after the module body.
